sentences.sentence: The studies of it inthe last few years indicated that the laving ways of CAB had a great efforts onmaize.

sentences.sentence: Objective: to explore the therapeutic effect of the abidance conduction and urokinase laving outside the ventricle to treat severe cerebral hemorrhage.
